description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/3056148235 at Tue Sep 20 15:10:32 UTC 2022

panels.description: The per-second rate of all database queries performed on the application side.
panels.title: RPS

panels.description: The p90 latency of all database query performed on the application side.
panels.title: Latency

panels.description: The total number of established connections both in use and idle.
panels.title: Open Connections

targets.expr:
sum (go_sql_dbstats_connections_open{app="registry", environment="$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", stage="$stage"})
/
sum (go_sql_dbstats_connections_max_open{app="registry", environment="$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", stage="$stage"})

panels.description: The aggregate table bloat saturation.
panels.title: Table Bloat

panels.description: The aggregate B-tree bloat saturation.
panels.title: B-tree Bloat

panels.description: Estimated database size.
panels.title: Database Size

panels.description: The per-second rate of all database queries performed on the application side.
panels.title: RPS (Aggregate)

panels.description: The per-second rate of each database query performed on the application side.
panels.title: RPS (Per Query)

panels.description: The p90 latency of all database query performed on the application side.
panels.title: Latency (Aggregate)

panels.description: The p90 latency of each database query performed on the application side.
panels.title: Latency (Per Query)

panels.description: The total number of established connections both in use and idle.
panels.title: Open

panels.description: The total number of connections currently in use.
panels.title: In Use

panels.description: The total aggregated number of idle connections.
panels.title: Idle

panels.description: Saturation. Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(clamp_max(sum (go_sql_dbstats_connections_open{app="registry", environment="$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", stage="$stage"})
/
sum (go_sql_dbstats_connections_max_open{app="registry", environment="$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", stage="$stage"})
,1),0)

panels.title: Saturation

panels.description: The total aggregated time blocked waiting for a new connection. Lower is better.
panels.title: Wait Time

panels.description: The total number of connections waited for.
panels.title: Waits

panels.description: The total number of connections closed due to the maximum idle count limit.
panels.title: Closed (Max Idle Count)

panels.description: The total number of connections closed due to the maximum idle time limit.
panels.title: Closed (Max Idle Time)

panels.description: The total number of connections closed due to the maximum lifetime limit.
panels.title: Closed (Max Lifetime)

panels.description: The number of established connections both in use and idle per pod.
panels.title: Open

panels.description: The number of connections currently in use per pod.
panels.title: In Use

panels.description: The number of idle connections per pod.
panels.title: Idle

panels.description: Saturation per pod. Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(clamp_max(sum by (pod) (go_sql_dbstats_connections_open{app="registry", environment="$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", stage="$stage"})
/
sum by (pod) (go_sql_dbstats_connections_max_open{app="registry", environment="$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", stage="$stage"})
,1),0)

panels.title: Saturation

panels.description: The aggregated time blocked waiting for a new connection per pod. Lower is better.
panels.title: Wait Time

panels.description: The number of connections waited for per pod.
panels.title: Waits

panels.description: The aggregate table bloat saturation.
panels.title: Saturation (Aggregate)

panels.description: The table bloat saturation. Limited to the top 20 entries.

targets.expr:
topk (
  20,
  max by (query_name) (gitlab_database_bloat_table_bloat_ratio{type="patroni-registry", environment="$environment", shard=~"$shard", query_name!~"pg_.*"})
)

panels.title: Saturation (Per Table)

panels.description: The table bloat size. Limited to the top 20 entries.

targets.expr:
topk (
  20,
  max by (query_name) (gitlab_database_bloat_table_bloat_size{type="patroni-registry", environment="$environment", shard=~"$shard", query_name!~"pg_.*"})
)

panels.title: Bloat Size

panels.description: The table real size. Limited to the top 20 entries.

targets.expr:
topk (
  20,
  max by (query_name) (gitlab_database_bloat_table_real_size{type="patroni-registry", environment="$environment", shard=~"$shard", query_name!~"pg_.*"})
)

panels.title: Real Size

panels.description: The aggregate B-tree bloat saturation.
panels.title: Saturation (Aggregate)

panels.description: The B-tree bloat saturation per index. Limited to the top 20 entries.

targets.expr:
topk (
  20,
  max by (query_name) (gitlab_database_bloat_btree_bloat_ratio{type="patroni-registry", environment="$environment", shard=~"$shard", query_name!~"pg_.*"})
)

panels.title: Saturation (Per Index)

panels.description: The B-tree bloat size per index. Limited to the top 20 entries.

targets.expr:
topk (
  20,
  max by (query_name) (gitlab_database_bloat_btree_bloat_size{type="patroni-registry", environment="$environment", shard=~"$shard", query_name!~"pg_.*"})
)

panels.title: Bloat Size

panels.description: The B-tree real size per index. Limited to the top 20 entries.

targets.expr:
topk (
  20,
  max by (query_name) (gitlab_database_bloat_btree_real_size{type="patroni-registry", environment="$environment", shard=~"$shard", query_name!~"pg_.*"})
)

panels.title: Real Size

panels.description:
CPU utilization.

more details.
panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description:
Memory utilization.

more details.
panels.title: Memory Utilization

panels.description:
Data utilization in bytes.

See https://cloud.google.com/monitoring/api/metrics_gcp#gcp-cloudsql for
more details.
panels.title: Disk Utilization

panels.description:
Delta count of number of transactions. Sampled every 60 seconds.

See https://cloud.google.com/monitoring/api/metrics_gcp#gcp-cloudsql for
more details.
panels.title: Transactions

title: registry: Database Detail
